column2: Mediabiasfactcheck.com rates Congressional Research Service Very High for factual reporting and usually sourced. It is also rated Least Biased as it uses very few loaded words - it is among the most credible media sources.

column2: rates it High for factual reporting due to proper sourcing and a clean fact check record and Left-Center biased based on story selection that mostly favors the left. See rating here.

column2: rates it High for factual reporting due to proper sourcing and a reasonable fact check record and moderately Left Biased based on story selection and editorial positions that favor the left. See rating here.

Media Description: freedomforuminstitute.org is a non=profit, non-partisan educational organization that works to raise awareness of First Amendment freedoms through education, advocacy and action, sharing the stories of Americans who have exercised their rights to ignite change. It also supports newsroom diversity and excellence in journalism. It provides information and sometimes expert testimony that members of Congress or others may find useful, but they do not lobby. They are a public charity funded by individuals, corporations and foundations.

Media Description: The World Bank (worldbank.org) is a think tank policy group of cooperative finance and development ministers representing 189 member countries. These reports and the primary data on which they are based are made available online at no cost.
